name: MOD-DCAT-Profile
abstract: This Building Block is the DCAT Profile for the MOD ontology
description:
## MOD-DCAT-Profile

This is the representation of the DCAT Profile for MOD. This document provides a human-readable description of the Profile.

examples.title: This is an example with just a description and no code snippets.
examples.content:
This is the content of the example.

In **Markdown** format.

examples.title: Examples can have content and/or code snippets.

annotatedSchema:
$schema: https://json-schema.org/draft/2020-12/schema
description: Schema for the MOD-DCAT-Profile building block
type: object
properties:
  a:
    type: string
    format: uri
  b:
    type: number
required:
- a
- b
